number-display.tooltip: normal: display window number, smart: display window number if more than one window, none: don't display number, all: display window number for favorites too

title-display.tooltip: focused: show focused window title, title: display the window title, app: diplay app name, none: don't display anything

show-alerts.tooltip: If enabled, notifications and alerts will appear.

show-pinned.tooltip: Controls whether or not the pinned apps appear in the panel if they are not open.

arrange-pinnedApps.tooltip: Arrange pinned apps into a different order.

icon-padding.tooltip: Controls how much space is between the icons.

enable-iconSize.tooltip: Adjust icon size independent of Cinnamon's panel scaling.

enable-hover-peek.tooltip: Controls whether or not windows display when hovered over.

hover-peek-time.tooltip: Controls how quickly a window will fade on hover.

hover-peek-opacity.tooltip: Opacity of the windows on hover.

thumbnail-timeout.tooltip: Controls how quickly an app's set of window thumbnails will fade out when the mouse leaves the app button.

thumbnail-size.tooltip: Controls the size of the thumbnails.

show-thumbnails.tooltip: Show window thumbnails when hovering over an app button.

vertical-thumbnails.tooltip: If enabled, thumbnails will stack vertically.

stack-thumbnails.tooltip: Stack window thumbnails if they exceed the available screen space.

sort-thumbnails.description: Sort windows for each app by last focused
sort-thumbnails.tooltip: Controls whether the order windows appear for an app is by last focused, or the order they were opened.

onclick-thumbnails.tooltip: Open the thumbnails on click if there is more than one window open.

show-recent.tooltip: Controls whether recent items will appear in the context menu.

closeall-menu-item.description: Enable option to close all windows
closeall-menu-item.tooltip: Show a "Close All" context menu item to close all windows for an app.

appmenu-width.tooltip: Set the width of the context menu.

firefox-menu.tooltip: Most Visited: show the sites you visit most, Recent History: display the the last pages you visited, Bookmarks: show your favorite bookmarks.

appmenu-number.tooltip: Controls how many items appear in the context menu.
